text: @Acyn @gtconway3d It’s just sooo stupid per Trump: “ If we stop testing now there’d be very few cases.”I guess see no evil, hear no evil etc is T method. Just cover up all the results &don’t talk abt it anymore &coronavirus will be gone. Or put your head in sand. That stuff ppl in hosp have-flu.🤥
